Security of IRS Tax Information
The IRS requires VA to have adequate programs in place to protect FTI, which includes FTI received from both the IRS and SSA.
Reference

M21-1, Part XIV, 4.B
, and
IRS Publication 1075
.
title: M21-1, Part XIV, Chapter 4, Section A - Federal Tax Information (FTI) Match:  General Information
